fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Empower another Galactic during the day to restore their abilities.
- Prepare your chemicals to be ready for use.
- Poison a player with your chemicals.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players affected by your chemicals die at the *beginning* of the next night.
- Additionally, they also spread the chemicals to all who visit them. Those players are unable to spread it.
- If you become unempowered, all players affected by your chemicals are cured, and do not die if they would have otherwise. This doesn't apply if you are unempowered from dying.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the extermination of all who would stand in the way of the intergalactic empire.
